name: Add New Task
description: New task for Asset Change Activity

arguments.tagList: {% set tags = [] %}{% for asset in vars.assetIRI %}{% set _ = tags.append((asset | fromIRI).hostname) %}{% endfor %}{% set _ = tags.extend(("OT IT", "Asset Change Activity")) %}{{tags}}

inputVariables.name: assignedPerson
inputVariables.label: Assigned Person
inputVariables.title: Lookup (One to Many or One to One)

message.content: Added Task {{vars.steps.Add_Task_Details.input.name}} - {{vars.input.records[0].title}}
